{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/inner_iterator/title|operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|
constexpr ranges::range_reference_t&lt;V&gt; operator*() const;
}}

Returns the current element in current chunk in the {{tt|chunk_view}}.

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to {{tt|chunk_view}}. Equivalent to: {{box|{{c/core|return **}}{{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}}{{c/core|-&gt;}}{{lti|cpp/ranges/chunk_view#Data members|current_;}}}}.

Before invocation of this operator the expression {{c|1=*this == std::default_sentinel}} must be {{c/core|false}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element in current chunk.
